## Version release PR:

Issue to keep track of what is needed for a new AQUA-diagnostics release

- [ ] update changelog
- [ ] update bug report menu
- [ ] update version number in `aqua/diagnostics/version.py`
- [ ] if it's an operational release, be sure the bug report menu is updated in the main as well
- [ ] check `aqua-core` pin before merging to be fixed to the current tagged version
- [ ] restore `aqua-core` pin after merging to be greater than the current tagged version
